const response = await client.search({
  index: "log-messages",
  filter_path: "aggregations",
  aggs: {
    categories: {
      categorize_text: {
        field: "message",
        categorization_filters: ["\\w+\\_\\d{3}"],
        similarity_threshold: 11,
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
